name: AttractHappyLoveSleepAffirmation
0:
”Alexa, open attract love sleeping”
”Alexa, ask attract love sleeping for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start attract love sleeping”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: attract love sleeping
des: Listen to this audio while you sleep and expand your thoughts about happiness, love and self acceptance. You can play this relaxing 1hour and 15 minute long audio through the entire night by saying “Alexa, loop” to loop the current episode. For the best results, listen to this audio for 30 nights in a row. Please do not drive or operate machinery while listening to this audio. This work is not intended to substitute for professional medical or counseling advice. If you suffer from a physical or mental illness, please always seek professional help. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
